description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 9). Rockley is assigned to watch over Quwasan Olibee, and is stationed alongside her on the merchant ship Epsilon, and later the Krepaul. He pilots the Heavy Metal Calvary Temple.
He remains loyal to Poseidal when Giwaza gathers much of the other Elite 13 members and rebels. While he participates in the final battle on Sveto, his ultimate fate is unknown.
name: Rockley Ron
